localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: You can now speed up your workflow right from within your VS Code environment. Here are some key features of the plugin: - Preview Lottie files - Edit Lottie files - Search through animations on LottieFiles - Extract and view a dotLottie file and its contents
blogPost.body: You can now speed up your workflow right from within your VS Code environment. Here are some key features of the plugin: - Preview Lottie files - Edit Lottie files - Search through animations on LottieFiles - Extract and view a dotLottie file and its contents
blogPost.title: LottieFiles for VS Code - Speed up your Lottie workflow right from within VS Code
blogPost.author: Jawish Hameed

localize.description: 现在，您可以直接从VS代码环境中加速您的工作流。以下是该插件的一些关键功能：-预览Lottie文件-编辑Lottie文件-搜索LottieFiles上的动画-提取并查看dotLottie文件及其内容
localize.tagline: 直接从VS代码中加速您的Lottie工作流

localize.description: 現在，您可以直接從VS代碼環境中加速您的工作流。以下是該插件的一些關鍵功能：-預覽Lottie文件-編輯Lottie文件-搜索LottieFiles上的動畫-提取並查看dotLottie文件及其內容
localize.tagline: 直接從VS代碼中加速您的Lottie工作流

previous.title:
At $7.56 trillion, the Fed's Balance Sheet hit another new high this week.

The Fed's total assets have increased $3.4 trillion over the last year and they have promised to keep buying bonds at a rate of $120 billion per month. https://t.co/BZnuED1CHd

localize.full_text:
7.56万亿美元，本周美联储资产负债表再创新高。

美联储的总资产在过去一年中增加了3.4万亿美元，他们承诺将继续以每月1200亿美元的速度购买债券。https://t.co/BZnuED1CHd。

7.56萬億美元，本週美聯儲資產負債表再創新高。

美聯儲的總資產在過去一年中增加了3.4萬億美元，他們承諾將繼續以每月1200億美元的速度購買債券。https://t.co/BZnuED1CHd。
